paragraphs.content: The confidentiality and use restrictions under this Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of {{ duration_amount }} {{ duration_unit }} from the date of disclosure of the relevant Confidential Information, unless a shorter period is specified in writing by the Disclosing Party.

Notwithstanding the foregoing, each Receiving Party shall maintain the confidentiality of any Confidential Information that constitutes a trade secret under applicable law for as long as such information retains its status as a trade secret.
